inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient reports that he is currently homeless and has lost his supply of insulin, syringes, glucometer, and glucose testing supplies

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient reports that he is currently homeless and has lost his supply of insulin, syringes, glucometer, and glucose testing supplies

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: He reports that he has been on insulin since the time of his diagnosis, and he has never been prescribed oral agents for diabetes management. Most recently, he has been using insulin glargine 55 units once daily, and insulin aspart sliding scale 3 times daily.

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: With this episode of hyperglycemia, he is not experiencing any nausea, vomiting, or abdominal discomfort, and he appears well.

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling/unable to attend follow up visits
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unlikely to adhere to study procedures
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, for which he was hospitalized. He is currently homeless and has lost his supply of insulin, syringes, glucometer, and glucose testing supplies.
